給予.definition: (literary) to give; to accord; to render

給事.definition: (the name of an official position in the imperial court), aka 給事中|给事中[ji3 shi4 zhong1]

給你點顏色看看.pinyin: gei3 ni3 dian3 yan2 se4 kan4 kan5
給你點顏色看看.definition: (I'll) teach you a lesson; put you in your place

給力.definition: cool; nifty; awesome; impressive; to put in extra effort

給定.definition: to state in advance; preset; given

給水.definition: to supply water; to provide feedwater

給與.definition: variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]

給面子.definition: to show deference or praise publicly

給養.definition: provisions; supplies; victuals; (literary) to support; to provide for; to look after
